meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unsociable.
meanings.sent1: Her unsociablenesses made it difficult for her to make friends.
meanings.sent2: His unsociablenesses often led to him being alone at social gatherings.
meanings.sent3: Despite her unsociablenesses, she still enjoyed spending time with her cat.
meanings.sent4: The unsociablenesses of the old house gave it a mysterious aura.
meanings.sent5: The unsociablenesses of the storm clouds warned of an impending downpour.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being unfriendly or uncommunicative in social situations.
meanings.sent1: The unsociablenesses of the neighbor made it hard to approach them.
meanings.sent2: His unsociablenesses were evident in his reluctance to join group activities.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unsociablenesses towards strangers amused the family.
meanings.sent4: The unsociablenesses of the closed door symbolized privacy and solitude.
meanings.sent5: The unsociablenesses of the dark forest sent shivers down her spine.
